name: robota-monorepo
description: 쉽게 Agentic AI를 만들 수 있는 JavaScript 라이브러리

scripts.build:deps: pnpm --filter @robota/core build && pnpm --filter @robota/tools build && pnpm --filter "@robota/!(core|tools)" build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter @robota/core typecheck && pnpm --filter @robota/tools typecheck && pnpm --filter @robota/langchain typecheck && pnpm --filter @robota/replicate typecheck && pnpm --filter @robota/anthropic typecheck && pnpm --filter @robota/openai typecheck
